Abilities.Name: Blaze
Abilities.Description: Increases the damage of Fire-type moves by 50% when the user's HP is below 1/3 its max.

Abilities.Name: Libero
Abilities.Description: Changes the Pokemon's type to the type of the move it is about to use. This works only once each time the Pokemon enters battle.

Moves.Name: High Jump Kick
Moves.Description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

Moves.Name: Pyro Ball
Moves.Description: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Moves.Name: Acrobatics
Moves.Description: The user nimbly strikes the target. This attack does massive damage if the user isn't holding an item.

Moves.Name: Iron Head
Moves.Description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Bulk Up
Moves.Description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting its Attack and Defense stats.

Abilities.Name: Cursed Body
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to disable the opponent's move that damages the user.

Moves.Name: Dark Pulse
Moves.Description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with ill intent. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Clear Smog
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are eliminated.

Moves.Name: Sludge Bomb
Moves.Description: The user hurls unsanitary sludge at the target to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

Moves.Name: Shadow Claw
Moves.Description: The user attacks by slashing the target with a sharp claw made from shadows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Moves.Name: Lick
Moves.Description: The user licks the target with a long tongue to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Abilities.Name: Cursed Body
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to disable the opponent's move that damages the user.

Moves.Name: Shadow Ball
Moves.Description: The user attacks by hurling a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Moves.Name: Clear Smog
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are eliminated.

Moves.Name: Sludge Bomb
Moves.Description: The user hurls unsanitary sludge at the target to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

Moves.Name: Night Shade
Moves.Description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

Moves.Name: Lick
Moves.Description: The user licks the target with a long tongue to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Moves.Name: Confuse Ray
Moves.Description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that causes confusion.

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: The user lower's the opponent's Attack by one stage whenever it enters the battlefield.

Abilities.Name: Moxie
Abilities.Description: The user's Attack is increased by one stage whenever it knocks out another Pokemon.

Moves.Name: Aqua Tail
Moves.Description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

Moves.Name: Dragon Dance
Moves.Description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

Moves.Name: Waterfall
Moves.Description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

Moves.Name: Bite
Moves.Description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: The user lower's the opponent's Attack by one stage whenever it enters the battlefield.

Abilities.Name: Moxie
Abilities.Description: The user's Attack is increased by one stage whenever it knocks out another Pokemon.

Moves.Name: Hydro Pump
Moves.Description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

Moves.Name: Dragon Dance
Moves.Description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

Moves.Name: Aqua Tail
Moves.Description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

Moves.Name: Hurricane
Moves.Description: The user attacks by wrapping the target in a fierce wind. This may also confuse the target.

Moves.Name: Rain Dance
Moves.Description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type attacks. The rain also lowers the power of Fire-type attacks.
